app.alert.disabled: %s alerts are turned off for space '%s'.
app.alert.disabled.no.alerts: No alerts are current enabled for space '%s'.
app.alert.enabled: OK, I've enabled %s alerts for space '%s'.
app.alert.list.off: All alerts are currently turned off.
app.alert.config.enabled: OK, the threshold for %s is now %s%s in space %s.
app.alert.config.invalid: %s is not a valid threshold.  Please specify a threshold between between 1 and 100%s.
app.alert.config.please.enable: Please enable '%s' alerts before setting a threshold.
app.alert.enable.and.set.enabled: OK, I'll let you know when %s exceeds %s%s for apps in space %s.
app.alert.enable.and.set.invalid: %s is not a valid threshold.  Please specify a threshold between between 1 and 100%s.
app.alert.enable.app.events: OK, I'll let you know when any event happens to apps in space %s.
app.alert.move.complete: Alerts for space '%s' have moved to room '%s'
app.alert.monitor.resource.error: Error processing threshold alerts for space: %s
app.alert.monitor.resource.title: space: %s
help.app.alert.change: Sets alert threshold for specified resource.
help.app.alert.set.app.event: Enable alerts when events happen for any app in the active space.
help.app.alert.set.app.resource: Enable resource alert and set threshold.
help.app.alert.off: Turns off alerts for specified resource.
help.app.alert.on: Turns on alerts for specified resource.
app.problems.error: Sorry, bot problematic information is currently unavailable.
app.problems.no.problematic: I don't have any problematic applications for you%s!
help.app.show.me.problems: Show top 5 most problematic apps [today|this week] in the active space.
conversation.timed.out: Our conversation timed out.  You can try again later.
conversation.try.again.or.exit: That is not one of the choices. Try again, or type 'exit'.
conversation.try.again.yes.no: That is not one of the choices. Try 'yes' or 'no'.
cognitive.parse.problem.timeframe: I'm having problems understanding the timeframe. To show application problems use *app show me problems [today|this week]*.
cognitive.parse.problem.type: I'm having problems understanding the provided alert type. Should be one of the following: *cpu*, *memory*, *disk*, *event*, or *all*.
cognitive.parse.problem.thresholdType: I'm having problems understanding the provided alert type. Should be one of the following: *cpu*, *memory*, or *disk*.
cognitive.parse.problem.threshold: I'm having problems understanding the provided threshold. Should be a percentage input as a number.
